description: [``botocore``] This release updates 3 API parameters. UpdateAssessmentFrameworkControlSet now requires the controls attribute, and CreateAssessmentFrameworkControl requires the id attribute. Additionally, UpdateAssessmentFramework now has a minimum length constraint for the controlSets attribute.
[``botocore``] Adding names parameters to the Describe APIs.
[``botocore``] Update RelatedItem enum to support SSM Automation
[``botocore``] Update events client to latest version
[``botocore``] Adding request header for Lambda recursion detection.
